assetProfile.address2: Suite F9D Off Western Express Highway Santacruz (E)
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Mahindra CIE Automotive Limited manufactures and supplies automotive components to original equipment manufacturers and other customers in India and Europe. The company offers forging products, such as crankshafts, steering components, and other forged products; stampings, including body systems, chassis systems, and assembly; gears, shafts, and bevel set gears; axle and transmission parts, engine parts, and other products; magnetic products comprise permanent magnet, soft ferrite cores, impeder cores, and magnetic induction lightings; sheet and dough molding compounds; and auto parts, medical equipment covers, and windmill parts. It also provides oil sumps, turbo housings, connecting rods, exhaust mainfolds, passive entry antenna components, synchro hubs, and differential, planetary, and carrier housing products; knuckles/stub axles, brake calipers, spring saddles, hoods, fenders, bonnets, foot plates, front grills, and stamped cabin components; and lift arms, rocker arms, trunion brackets, and toppling cranks. The company offers its products for use in cars, utility vehicles, commercial vehicles, agriculture and off road vehicles, and two-wheelers. The company was formerly known as Mahindra Forgings Limited and changed its name to Mahindra CIE Automotive Limited in November 2013. The company was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Mumbai, India. Mahindra CIE Automotive Limited is a subsidiary of Participaciones Internacionales Autometal Dos S.L.
